casebody.data:
No. 10-1303. Ava Heydt-Benjamin, Petitioner v. Thomas Heydt-Benjamin. 564 U.S. 1047, 131 S. Ct. 3068,

180 L. Ed. 2d 904,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 4809. June 27, 2011.

Motion of Professor Linda D. Elrod, et al. for leave to file a brief as amici curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit denied.

Same case below, 404 Fed. Appx. 527.
